attributes.action: Keep our friend German Paul in Swansea.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
German Paul is a very nice bloke and unfortunatley he has to leave to go home. We dont think he should as he helps to bring the UK and Germany together.

We would like the Prime minister to put a ban in place on him going back to Germany so he can stay in Swansea with us.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
